H0.text: The largest region in New Zealand is Canterbury. Which city is the seat of government. Wellington

H1.text: The largest region in New Zealand is Canterbury. Which city is the seat of government. Auckland

H2.text: The largest region in New Zealand is Canterbury. Which city is the seat of government. Dunedin

H3.text: The largest region in New Zealand is Canterbury. Which city is the seat of government. ChCh

A4.text: The capital of New Zealand has been Wellington since 1865.

A5.text: The move of the capital from Auckland to Wellington was undertaken in 1865, and Wellington has been New Zealand's capital since.
